string-array.name: shopping
string-array.item: What is the website address of M&S? e.g.(www.XXX.com)
What is the price of a Boy London T-shirt in Selfridges of London?(£)
How many new arrivals for this week on HM.com?
How many rings on the hand of the woman called Hailey Baldwin on the Topshop website?
What is the UK landline for online enquiries of Harrods?
Just enter you email address and We will sent you the voucher code for 20% off discount!

string-array.name: food
string-array.item: Take the underground to the Warren Street station, find the 82 Cleveland St, what is the name of this restaurant?
Keep going to Piccadilly Circus station, and get to 56 Brewer St, which country this restaurant is from?
Then take the underground to Leicester Square station and go to the Chinatown, there is a restaurant called HaoZhan, how much is its crispy duck meal per person?
How long will it take you to reach Tottenham Court Road station from Leicester Square station by underground?(mins)

When you arrive, go out of the station and get to 53 St Giles High St, there is a Korean restaurant called ASSA, how many lamps above the sign of the restaurant? NB: This is a final and time limit question.
Well done! You have finished all the questions! Just enter your name and the treasure will be given to you after getting through it.

string-array.name: fun
string-array.item: Go to timeout.com and find what is the UK box office top one film recently?
Click the fourth of that top ten ranking, what date was that girl missing?(in format dd/mm/yyyy)
Read the below article carefully, what is the seventh name appearing in the text?
Last question! How many movies does Rosamund Pike have? The answer is hidden after one link on this page, try to find it and enter the number!
Good job! Here is your QR code for a free film in any ODEON cinema! Just scan it when you enter the cinema.
